content.html: Suggestion: auto-archive projects instead: code is still available, issues etc are flattened to read-only static copies. Have a "reactivate project" button the user can click to re-inflate their project back to live status Not trivial to build, but SO MUCH better than deletion
content.value:
Suggestion: auto-archive projects instead: code is still available, issues etc are flattened to read-only static copies. Have a "reactivate project" button the user can click to re-inflate their project back to live status

Not trivial to build, but SO MUCH better than deletion
